summary: Frontend-only testing completed for P0 Bug: Meal Swap UI Update. The bug has been FIXED. All meal swap operations (breakfast, lunch, dinner) now correctly update the UI immediately after selection.
critical_code_review_comments: The fix correctly passes setMealPlan as a prop to MealPlannerModal and uses it to update local state immediately after API call
The confirmSwap function now properly updates the mealPlan state using setMealPlan instead of relying on loadAllData()
context_for_next_testing_agent: Meal swap functionality is working correctly. Tested all three meal types (breakfast, lunch, dinner). UI updates immediately and changes persist to backend.

tests_performed.details: Clicking 'Plan Meals' button opens the Meal Planner modal correctly
Clicking any meal row opens the swap selection modal with 'Choose [meal_type]' header
Swapped from 'Steak & Egg Scramble' to 'Greek Yogurt Power Bowl' - UI updated immediately
Swapped from 'Adult Lunchable (Chicken Edition)' to 'Turkey & Hummus Wrap' - UI updated immediately
Swapped from 'Modular Turkey Chili (Hidden Veggie)' to 'Sheet Pan Roasted Meat & Veg' - UI updated immediately
Verified via API call that swapped meals are persisted to database
The 'Today's Meal Status' section on main page shows the updated meal names

bug_status: FIXED - The meal swap UI now updates immediately after selecting a different meal
